Sutherland is lighting up today with 3 ft @8s WNW swell and fresh 22 mph NNE winds. Balnakeil and Oldshoremore are your top picks, both offering fun conditions during their tide windows. Tomorrow, the swell builds to 4 ft @10s NNW with light N winds, making for a clean and enjoyable session. The day after, expect similar 3 ft @10s NNW conditions, but with a moderate 12 mph NNW breeze. Best: tomorrow.
